name: Binding Throw

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Grapple, Improved Trip, Improved Unarmed Strike, Ki Throw.

sections.body: After you successfully use the Ki Throw feat on an opponent, you can use a swift action to attempt a grapple combat maneuver against that opponent.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: The grapple combat maneuver is a standard action.
sections.name: Normal

sections.body: A monk can gain Binding Throw as a bonus feat starting at 14th level.
sections.name: Special

description: You can strike your enemy and use the blow as an opportunity to grab and hold him.
